name: Soda Stream
description:
Made for Mini Jam 63 - Future!

The year is 2102... Sugar prices are through the roof! Soda competition's getting greedy and they're sending soda robots to sabotage your production! You've got to stop them and get your soda to the masses by building a pipe! Add onto the pipe, punch the comically-themed soda robots, and try to make it as long as you can.

Credit to the creator of the Arcade Standard 29 palette that I used for this game! https://lospec.com/palette-list/arcade-standard-29
